actions.text: On agreeing to the Parker amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 218 (Roll no. 259).

description: Amendment sought to increase funding for low-income weatherization assistance grants and State energy conservation grants by $18.4 million and reduce other energy conservation programs by the same amount.
purpose: An amendment numbered 23 as printed in the Congressional Record to increase the bill's funding by $18,204,000 for weatherization programs by transferring the funds out of energy conservation programs.
